name: Project Boid
description:
While no one asked for this, Project Boid is here!

A wonderful adventure in which you die (partially because of the zombies, partially because you don't know what is going on and partially because i am an idiot) a lot.

Get Ready For:
  • No sound except for annoying footsteps
  • Graphics in the Misiekfid™ Style
  • Dying

TLDR;Project Zomboid but on a time limit

also awful

made for Untitled Game Jam 74 - Copycat
